short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ugh. As if. Isn't that how you feel about everything?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension replaces all pictures in your Facebook feed with that 'Ugh. As If' gif. Also works on Instagram's web version.

Just install this extension and read the original captions with the awesome gif.

Use with caution. This extension means no offence. Next version of the extension will try to leave out serious posts.
